data.name: Your Computer Might Be At Risk Demo
data.detailed_description:
A plan that almost worked out.

An unfinished story, forgotten twenty years ago, returns to be concluded.

An story about wrong decisions.

Your Computer Might Be At Risk[\b] is a first-person narrative puzzle game. Locked up in a room after a mysterious car accident, you must figure out how to escape while surviving dangerous trials and solving dozens of puzzles. Narrated in parallel, twenty years later your son unravels the story of your mysterious vanishing.

FEATURES

  • Unique 3D visual style with stylized models, vibrant colors aesthetic inspired by Giallo genre and animated video cutscenes created from real video footage.
  • Solve dozens of puzzles with unique and interesting mechanics.
  • Varied gameplay, from fixed-camera point and click scenes to first-person camera with free movement.
  • Diverse scenes and situations, from the real world to dreamlike stages.

fullgame.name: Your Computer Might Be At Risk

data.supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher 64-bit
  • Processor: 1.9 Ghz Intel i5 (Equivalent processor) or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard or dedicated graphics accelerator
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.9 Ghz Intel i7 (Equivalent processor) or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard or dedicated graphics accelerator
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard soundcard

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+, SteamOS
  • Processor: 1.9 Ghz Intel i5 (Equivalent processor) or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard or dedicated graphics accelerator
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard soundcard
